pr_title: Introduce a generic EventSink to make it easier for tests to capture specific event types

timeline.message: Introduce a generic EventSink to make it easier for tests to capture specific types of events.

timeline.bodyText: Why do you take the eventType as an argument to this class? You already take it in the constructor.
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: It's a static method which invokes the constructor and registers the instance with the event bus.
replies.author: ajsutton
